sequenceDescription: Relentless techno with driving kick pattern
musicalContext: Industrial techno at 135 BPM. Constant kick drum with evolving percussion and acid-style frequency sweeps. Raw and hypnotic.
emotionalArc: High-energy assault with moments of euphoria
visualJourney: Rhythmic pulsing intensifies, colors shift from blue to purple

keyMoments.description: Rising energy - complexity increases as the beat drives forward
Maximum intensity - the The heartbeat of the underground dancefloor explodes with energy
Maximum intensity - the The heartbeat of the underground dancefloor explodes with energy
Rising energy - complexity increases as the beat drives forward

bass.visualImpact: Controls twist factor - bass creates hypnotic spiral motion

kick.visualImpact: Drives pulse intensity - the visual kick drum

mid.visualImpact: Controls shape morphing between sphere and cube forms

high.visualImpact: Creates rim lighting and sharp edge definition

energy.visualImpact: Saturates colors from muted blues to vibrant purples
